text: Hello fellow HubSpot Dev Slackers. Brand new here, having just been prompted to join via the excellent HubSpot Academy Courses!  I've been heavily involved with ecommerce Dev and marketing for over 10 years covering a wide range of CMS's, SaaS's and many other tools in the ecomm stack. 46 years young and from the UK and looking forward to making some new acquaintances.
